text: aur khuda ne momineen (kee tasallee) ke lie phiraun kee beevee (aasiya) kee misaal bayaan faramaayee hai ki jab usane dua kee paravaradigaar mere lie apane yahaan behisht mein ek ghar bana aur mujhe phiraun aur usakee kaarastaanee se najaat de aur mujhe zaalim logo (ke haath) se chhutakaara ata farama
